alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 1:11PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Broadwater, central Madison, southeastern Beaverhead, southeastern Jefferson and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Silver Star to 14 miles southwest of Lima. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar and sensor indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. The Dillon Airport recorded a wind gust of 40 mph with this line of thunderstorms. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Virginia City, Three Forks, Manhattan, Ennis, Lima, Alder, Pony, Monida, Harrison, Norris, Bannack Pass, Mcallister, Laurin, Cameron, Snowline, Logan, Jeffers, Willow Creek and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 22 . Interstate 90 between mile markers 279 and 290. Highway 287 between mile markers 36 and 82, and between mile markers 95 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
